text: Salvador Alejandro Jorge del Solar Labarthe (; born 1 May 1970) is a Peruvian actor, lawyer and politician. He was the Prime Minister of Peru from being appointed by President Mart√≠n Vizcarra on 11 March 2019 until his resignation on 30 September 2019. He was Minister of Culture of Peru from 5 December 2016 to 27 December 2017 under President Pedro Pablo Kuczynski. ==References== Category:Politicians from Lima Category:Prime ministers of Peru Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Movie actors Category:Peruvian lawyers
title: Salvador del Solar
